      • createSerializerGson

        public static com.google.gson.Gson createSerializerGson(ApiDefinition apiDefinition)
        Convenience method to create Gson instance for serialising objects and using the date time format and serialisation strategies as specified in ApiDefinition
        Parameters:
        apiDefinition - api definition
        Returns:
        gson with custom inclusion strategies and custom serializers added

      • createDeserializerGson

        public static com.google.gson.Gson createDeserializerGson(ApiDefinition apiDefinition)
        Convenience method to create Gson instance for deserializing Mambu responses and using the default date time format and custom deserializing strategies as specified in ApiDefinition
        Parameters:
        apiDefinition - api definition
        Returns:
        gson with the default date time format and custom deserializers added
